p: EGFR is another important protein in relation to tumor development [ 43]. Signaling by EGFR plays a key role in tumorigenesis prompted efforts to target this receptor in anticancer therapy [ 44]. It was the target protein of the selected main active ingredients, geraniol and eugenol. This protein was involved in 18 pathways in the network, most of which were tumor-related, such as ErbB signaling pathway, bladder cancer, endometrial cancer and colorectal cancer.
